description: Describes the Amazon FPGA Images (AFIs) available to you. These include public AFIs, private AFIs that you own, and AFIs owned by other Amazon Web Services accounts for which you have load permissions.

parameters.name: Owners
parameters.description: Filters the AFI by owner. Specify an Amazon Web Services account ID, self (owner is the sender of the request), or an Amazon Web Services owner alias (valid values are amazon | aws-marketplace). (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. create-time - The creation time of the AFI. fpga-image-id - The FPGA image identifier (AFI ID). fpga-image-global-id - The global FPGA image identifier (AGFI ID). name - The name of the AFI. owner-id - The Amazon Web Services account ID of the AFI owner. product-code - The product code. shell-version - The version of the Amazon Web Services Shell that was used to create the bitstream. state - The state of the AFI ( pending | failed | available | unavailable). tag:<key> - The key/value combination of a tag assigned to the resource. Use the tag key in the filter name and the tag value as the filter value. For example, to find all resources that have a tag with the key Owner and the value TeamA, specify tag:Owner for the filter name and TeamA for the filter value. tag-key - The key of a tag assigned to the resource. Use this filter to find all resources assigned a tag with a specific key, regardless of the tag value. update-time - The time of the most recent update. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: FpgaImages
nested_items.description: Information about the FPGA images.

nested_items.name: FpgaImageId
nested_items.description: The FPGA image identifier (AFI ID).

nested_items.name: FpgaImageGlobalId
nested_items.description: The global FPGA image identifier (AGFI ID).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the AFI.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the AFI.

nested_items.name: ShellVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the Amazon Web Services Shell that was used to create the bitstream.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the device.

nested_items.name: VendorId
nested_items.description: The ID of the vendor.

nested_items.name: SubsystemId
nested_items.description: The ID of the subsystem.

nested_items.name: SubsystemVendorId
nested_items.description: The ID of the vendor for the subsystem.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The state. The following are the possible values:
pending - AFI bitstream generation is in progress.
available - The AFI is available for use.
failed - AFI bitstream generation failed.
unavailable - The AFI is no longer available for use.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: If the state is failed, this is the error message.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the AFI was created.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time of the most recent update to the AFI.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the AFI.

nested_items.name: OwnerAlias
nested_items.description: The alias of the AFI owner. Possible values include self, amazon, and aws-marketplace.

nested_items.name: ProductCodes
nested_items.description: The product codes for the AFI.

nested_items.name: ProductCodeId
nested_items.description: The product code.

nested_items.name: ProductCodeType
nested_items.description: The type of product code.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Any tags assigned to the AFI.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: Public
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the AFI is public.

nested_items.name: DataRetentionSupport
nested_items.description: Indicates whether data retention support is enabled for the AFI.

nested_items.name: InstanceTypes
nested_items.description: The instance types supported by the AFI.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
